<\dot{x}(t_{1})\dot{x}(t_{2})>\sim-\frac{aD}{t_{2}^{\beta}}\exp\left(-\frac{a}% {1-\beta}(t_{2}^{1-\beta}-t_{1}^{1-\beta})\right).
